summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Craven Cooling FSM system. Backend APIs are fully functional with all 14 test cases passing. Frontend core functionality works including user registration, dashboard, navigation, and CRUD operations for customers, sites, and jobs. Identified some React Select component validation issues that need attention.

ui_bugs.issue: React Select validation error - 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (core functionality working, minor Select component issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix React Select component validation issues in shadcn/ui components. The error indicates Select.Item components need proper value props. This affects form dropdowns in Assets, Jobs, Quotes, and Invoices pages. All core functionality is working but these validation errors should be resolved for production readiness.
